summary: An Ordinance fixing the rate of taxes to be levied and levying the taxes upon the taxable property in the City of Seattle, both real and personal, needed to raise sufficient revenue to meet the expenses of the different departments of the city government of The City of Seattle for the ensuing fiscal year, to-wit: for the year beginning on the first day of January, 1910 and ending on the 31st day of December, 1910, including the interest the accrue during said year on the bonded debt of The City of Seattle.
